seo.title: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Sports Stores (2026)
seo.meta_description: Athletes and sports fans expect fast, trustworthy stores. See how 20 Shopify sports stores perform on pagespeed score. Median: 47, Top 10%: 71. Free benchmarks.
keywords: best pagespeed score for sports stores
how to improve pagespeed score shopify

key_findings: The average Sports store scores 47 on PageSpeed, falling into Google's "poor" category
Top 10% of stores achieve scores of 71+, giving them a significant competitive advantage
There's a 44 point gap between top and bottom performers in this niche
More than half of stores in this niche fall below Google's minimum acceptable threshold
Source: Boostra analysis of 20 Shopify sports stores, 2026-01-04.
how_to_improve: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight
Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets
Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code
Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store
Minimize main-thread work by deferring non-critical JavaScript
Reduce the impact of third-party scripts like analytics and chat widgets
Consider a performance-focused Shopify theme if your current theme is bloated

jsonld.name: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Sports Stores
jsonld.description: Performance benchmark data for 20 Shopify stores in the sports equipment industry, measuring pagespeed score.

acceptedAnswer.text: PageSpeed Score is Google's comprehensive performance metric (0-100) that evaluates your site's speed and user experience. Higher scores correlate with better SEO rankings and conversion rates.

mainEntity.name: Why does PageSpeed Score matter for sports stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: PageSpeed Score is Google's comprehensive performance metric (0-100) that evaluates your site's speed and user experience. Higher scores correlate with better SEO rankings and conversion rates. Scores of 90+ are considered 'good', 50-89 'needs improvement', and below 50 'poor'.

mainEntity.name: What is a good PageSpeed Score for Shopify sports stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Based on Boostra's analysis of 20 Shopify sports stores, the median pagespeed score is 47. Top-performing stores in this niche (top 10%) achieve 71. Scores of 90+ are considered 'good', 50-89 'needs improvement', and below 50 'poor'.

mainEntity.name: How can I improve my sports store's PageSpeed Score?

acceptedAnswer.text: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight. Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets. Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code. Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store. For a personalized analysis of your store's specific issues and opportunities, consider a professional CRO audit.

mainEntity.name: How does my store compare to other sports stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can compare your pagespeed score against our benchmarks. If your score is better than 47 (the median), you're in the top half of sports stores. If you're better than 71, you're among the top 10% performers in your industry.
